paragraphs.paragraph: My path to software development began during university, where I discovered my passion for creating digital solutions. What started as curiosity about how websites work evolved into a deep appreciation for the craft of programming.

Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work on diverse projects, from small business websites to complex web applications. Each project has taught me something new and reinforced my belief that technology should serve people and make their lives better.
Today, I'm actively seeking new challenges and opportunities to grow, collaborate with talented teams, and contribute to meaningful projects that have a positive impact.
